akas: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days (original title)
90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days USA
akas from release info: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days (original title)
90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days USA

-1.title: Extended: Trust a Try

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days (TV Series 2017– )

-1.plot: Extended; Paul waits for Karine at the alter; Angela makes unpleasant discovery in Nigeria; Rickey keeps a major secret from Ximena; Darcy and Jesse reach a breaking point; Tarik tries to make good things with Hazel; Jon defends his criminal past.

1.title: Bon Voyage!

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Three Americans who feel they have met their potential soulmates online prepare to travel internationally to meet them in person for the first time. They will put everything on the line for love, hoping their trips will lead to engagement.

2.title: Going the Distance

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Two couples may finally meet for the first time... Sean lands in Haiti to potentially meet his love Abby, Paul embarks on a two-day boat trip down the Amazon in hopes that Karine will actually show up, and Darcey encounters airport mishaps in Amsterdam.

3.title: Lanuage of Love

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Darcey and Jesse spend their first day together in Amsterdam. Paul worries he is getting stood up in Brazil. Cortney prepares to meet a Spanish model she has only ever texted. Sean tries to put his doubts aside while spending time with Abby.

4.title: Meet the Parents

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Paul struggles to communicate with Karine's family. Dinner with Jesse's parents takes an unexpected turn for Darcey. Cortney leaves for Spain hoping that Antonio is not catfishing her. Patrick tells his family his plans to travel to Paris to meet Myriam.

5.title: Secrets and Lies

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Patrick leaves for Paris, while Myriam frets over a secret she has been keeping from him. Paul and Karine's happiness is interrupted by distrust. Sean faces tough questions from Abby's parents and Larry worries his Filipino girlfriend may not be faithful.

6.title: Decisions, Decisions

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Larry fails to get a hold of Jenny during his journey to the Philippines. Cortney hopes Antonio shows up at the airport. Darcey and Jesse struggle to defend their age gap to a skeptical friend. Sean makes a shocking new discovery about Abby's ex.

7.title: Baby I'm Worth It

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Paul worries about the results of Karine's STD & Pregnancy test. Cortney feels neglected during her first day in Spain. Larry encounters travel mishaps on his way to the Philippines. Myriam drops a bombshell on Patrick.

8.title: Moment of Truth

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: A disagreement between Darcey and Jesse escalates. Larry has questions about Jenny's past during his first day in Manilla. Patrick has a big decision to make in Paris after Myriam drops a bombshell. Abby's ex-boyfriend Chris arrives in Haiti.

9.title: Red Flags

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Mohamed hopes he is making the right choice with Danielle. Danny's brothers pass him the sex torch. Cassia confronts Jason's skeptical brother when meeting his family for the first time. Brett's mom confronts brett about Daya the day before the wedding.

10.title: Reality Check

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Karine wonders what happened to Paul... Larry insults Jenny's family when he visits. Sean questions his future with Abby after their blow-up. Cortney wants more insight on Antonio's feelings. Patrick and Myriam have a heart to heart in Paris.

11.title: On the Brink

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: Will Karine accept Paul's apology? Patrick pushes Myriam too far. Sparks fly between Cortney & Antonio. Sean goes in search of Abby after their fight. Jesse has a surprise for Darcey. Larry tries to make amends with Jenny after insulting her family.

12.title: Line in the Sand

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Tensions rise as Larry's cousin confronts Jenny. Patrick makes a last ditch effort to win over Myriam. Sean returns to Ohio uncertain about his future with Abby. Cortney worries about leaving Antonio in Spain, and Paul makes a grand gesture for Karine.

13.title: All of Nothing

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: Karine has a big decision ahead of her. Larry has an important question for Jenny. Cortney worries about the future as she leaves Spain. Darcey and Jesse share an emotional goodbye, and Sean returns to Haiti to see if Abby has kept her promise.

14.title: Tell All

episode of.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: The couples reunite for an emotional and riveting tell all special. Now that everyone is back to long distance, they face new pressures, tension, and challenges. Host Shaun Robinson gets to the bottom of where they stand now.

imdb.plot outline: Follow couples who have an existing relationship online, but haven't met in person. We'll experience their journey as they travel to the other's foreign country for the first time in an attempt to establish an in-person relationship and start the K-1 visa process.
imdb.title: 90 Day Fiancé: Before the 90 Days
plot: Follow couples who have an existing relationship online, but haven't met in person. We'll experience their journey as they travel to the other's foreign country for the first time in an attempt to establish an in-person relationship and start the K-1 visa process.
